register.success_queued:
The User with the Steam ID `{steam_id}` has been successfully registered as a hunter!
Your score calculation has been queued. Position in queue: {position}
This may take a while depending on the number of games in your library and other pending calculations.
To check your position in the queue, use /queue.
register.already_registered: You are already registered as a hunter. Use /update to update your score.
register.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch your Steam profile. Please try again later.
register.profile_not_public:
Cannot register: Your Steam profile is {visibility}!

To register as an Achievement Hunter, you need to:
1. Go to your Steam Profile Settings (Edit Profile ‚Üí Privacy Settings)
2. Set **My Profile** to **Public**
3. Set **Game Details** to **Public**
4. Set **Friends List** to **Public** (recommended)

After changing your privacy settings to Public, please try registering again.
register.game_details_private:
Cannot register: Your game details are private!

Your profile is public, but your game details are not accessible.

To register as an Achievement Hunter, you need to:
1. Go to your Steam Profile Settings (Edit Profile ‚Üí Privacy Settings)
2. Set **Game Details** to **Public** (not Friends Only or Private)

After changing your settings, please try registering again.
register.calculator_unavailable:
You have been successfully registered as a hunter!
However, the score calculator is currently unavailable. Please try updating your score later.

update.name: update
update.not_registered:
The Steam ID `{steam_id}` is not registered as a hunter.
Use `/register steam_id:{steam_id}` to register.
update.cooldown_message: You can update your score again {cooldown}.
update.private_profile:
Cannot update your score: Your Steam profile is private!

Please make your Steam profile public to use this feature:
1. Go to your Steam Profile Settings (Edit Profile ‚Üí Privacy Settings)
2. Set **My Profile** to **Public**
3. Set **Game Details** to **Public**

After changing your privacy settings, please try again.
update.fetch_failed: Failed to fetch your Steam profile. Please try again later.
update.allready_queued: Your score calculation is already in the queue at position {position}. Please wait.
update.calculator_unavailable: The score calculator is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

verify_steam.name: verify_steam
verify_steam.description_cmd: Verify your Steam account ownership via Discord connection
verify_steam.description_unavailable: Automatic Steam verification is not currently available.
verify_steam.why_text:
The OAuth2 server requires a `DISCORD_CLIENT_SECRET` to be configured.
This feature is being set up by the bot administrator.
verify_steam.alternative_text:
You can still register manually using:
`/register <your_steam_id>`

Find your Steam ID at: https://steamid.io/
verify_steam.title: üîó Steam Account Verification
verify_steam.description_embed: Automatically verify your Steam account ownership!
verify_steam.requirements_text:
‚úÖ Steam account linked in Discord
‚úÖ Steam profile set to **Public**
‚úÖ Game details set to **Public**
verify_steam.step1_field: 1Ô∏è‚É£ Link Steam to Discord (if not already done)
verify_steam.step1_text:
‚Ä¢ Go to **User Settings** ‚Üí **Connections**
‚Ä¢ Click **Add** ‚Üí Select **Steam**
‚Ä¢ Login and authorize
‚Ä¢ *(Optional)* Make it visible on your profile
verify_steam.step2_text:
This will:
‚Ä¢ Verify you own the Steam account
‚Ä¢ Automatically register you as an Achievement Hunter
‚Ä¢ Start calculating your score
verify_steam.privacy_text: This bot will only access your Discord connections to verify Steam ownership.

Please link your Steam account in Discord Connections and try again.
